# Bug

The `monetd` node exihibts strange functionailty when showing `out of gas` error.

`poa init` should take about `132716` gas.

With `monetd` running and setting the default `gas` to `1` then running `evmlc poa init` will exit with

```
EVM-Lite: Out of Gas
```

Then setting the `gas` to `1` below the required `gas` and running `poa init` again will result in no errors being thrown but instead the transaction uses all the `gas`.

```json
{
	"root": "0xf37f31d19b9e30758c1cc20efdb491d5b4b7ab166a9338c67dcd89aa0674cf78",
	"transactionHash": "0x332f4d6251649eabf7b8a3fa27921e2a03dbce74cf8f0898f8830db0e55e1452",
	"from": "0x0e807fd924fd52574226b6e7f68614662c21e509",
	"to": "0xabbaabbaabbaabbaabbaabbaabbaabbaabbaabba",
	"gasUsed": 132715,
	"cumulativeGasUsed": 132715,
	"contractAddress": "0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000",
	"logs": [],
	"logsBloom": "",
	"status": 0
}
```
